item.title: Bangalore to Hampi Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Hampi can be a fascinating journey, as you'll get to explore the historical ruins, ancient temples, and unique rock formations of this UNESCO World Heritage Site. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Chitradurga -> Hampi -> Chitradurga -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Hampi Start your trip early in the morning from
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
